alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Montgomery County; Central and Southern Scott County; Northern Montgomery County Higher Elevations; Northern Polk County Higher Elevations; Northern Scott County; Northwest Yell County; Polk County Lower Elevations; Southeast Polk County Higher Elevations; Southern and Eastern Logan County; Western and Northern Logan County; Yell Excluding Northwest (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 9:47AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Logan, Scott, northern Polk, southwestern Yell and northwestern Montgomery Counties through 1030 AM CDT... At 947 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles south of Echo to near Beauchamp. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mena... Waldron... Mansfield... Oden... Beauchamp... Cardiff... Mountain Fork... Muddy Creek WMA... Stonehouse Recreation Area... Opal... Gravelly... Polk County Fairgrounds... Fourche Valley... Mena Intermountain Airport... Shady... Oliver... Echo... Morgan Springs... Queen Wilhelmina State Park... Bates... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
